question: India celebrates National Voters Day on January 25, to commemorate which event?
option3: Foundation of Election Commission of India
answer: Foundation of Election Commission of India
explanation:
India celebrates National Voters Day on January 25 every year to commemorate the foundation day of the Election Commission of India.
The Election Commission of India (ECI) was founded in 1950 on the same day and this occasion was first celebrated in 2011. This year's theme is "Making Our Voters Empowered, Vigilant, Safe and Informed". ECI launched e-EPIC (Electronic Electoral Photo Identity Card), as a part of celebration.
